decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FLA11432/691D Rev: A; Unnumbered Mitsubishi Product Specification. Received: 31/08/2017.
A101 Rev: F01; A102 Rev: F03; A103 Rev: F01; A301 Rev: F01. Received: 10/11/2017.
QF9333/PF/6158/RP1. Received: 19/02/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The development shall be implemented in accordance with the findings and recommendations of the accompanying Noise Report numbered: QF9333/PF/6158/RP1 and received on: 19/02/2018.
Condition : 4 - The air conditioning units hereby approved should be turned off at any time the noise level exceeds 5dB beyond the existing background noise level.
